Information_3_1: ^Well, it seems like Gro is telling the truth. He insists he did not harm the children and another child went missing last night!
^Don't worry Harold. I'll continue looking for the children. The job is not over.

c-0: ^Thank you Revna. I don't know what we would have done had you not come around.
^I'm glad I can help. Any ideas where to start now?
^Well, if you think the children went to the forest start there!
